name: troubleshooting_guide

issue.description: The title or description of the issue being troubleshooted

summary.description: A brief summary of the issue and its impact

affected_systems.description: Systems, components, or environments affected by the issue

cause.description: Description of a potential root cause

likelihood.description: Likelihood of this being the actual cause

root_causes.description: Potential root causes of the issue

steps.description: Step-by-step instructions to implement the solution

complexity.description: Complexity level of implementing this solution

prerequisites.description: Prerequisites or requirements for this solution

solutions.description: Possible solutions to resolve the issue

prevention.description: Measures to prevent the issue from recurring

references.description: References to documentation, knowledge base articles, or other resources

system_prompt: You are a technical support specialist. Provide comprehensive troubleshooting guides for technical issues in a structured format. Include detailed information about symptoms, causes, and solutions to help users resolve problems efficiently.
